metadata.name: Mindful Reflections
metadata.description: For the first time Fusuma art of Japanese treasure in Kyoto dating from 15th century, has been entirely digitized as NFT. This is twin art with the NFT art of the first artwork for LOUVRE MUSEUM with an authenticated blockchain chip; 'Looking for Paradise' and has reflection of MUSÃ‰E DU LOUVRE.
